page.title: 09LIFE STYLE
page.content: Life styles for all the{population}of the area are changing constantly. The advent of the microchip and with it modern technology has increased the speed of{communication}drastically. Television can now link the farthest corners of the earth together instantaneously and people can communicate with each other by telephone, letter and, to a lesser extent, Citizen's Band radio. With more leisure time people are now seeking a far more diverse range of recreational activities and {entertainment. {Employment}in the area is higher than in most other areas of England with local unemployment running at around 10% of the total workforce.
